title: List of presidents of Indonesia - Wikipedia
snippet: During this time, the Emergency Government of the Republic of Indonesia, led by Sjafruddin Prawiranegara, acted as the country's government-in-exile until 13 July 1949. As a result, Sukarno's term in office actually had 206 days less. This figure includes his term as the president of the United States of Indonesia (27 December 1949 – 15 August 1950; 231 days), which was coterminous with Assaat being president of the constituent Republic of Indonesia.

title: President of Indonesia - Wikipedia
snippet: This was a clear sign that while the presidency is the key institution, the MPR was now a check on the president's power. Wahid was replaced by his vice-president, Megawati Sukarnoputri, daughter of Sukarno and former opposition leader during Suharto's presidency.

title: Prabowo Subianto - Wikipedia
snippet: Later that evening, Joko Widodo was officially announced as president and began to receive congratulations from world leaders. title: Prabowo is finally president in Indonesia – now what? | Lowy Institute
snippet: “Third time’s the charm,” screamed Indonesian and foreign media after Prabowo Subianto finally clinched victory. Twice Prabowo had lost to Joko “Jokowi” Widodo, yet Prabowo was welcomed into the fold by Jokowi following the 2019 trouncing.

title: Joko Widodo - BBC News
